api_list.name: Search by location
api_list.description: Search by location, location is city name, e.g. location=sunnyvale,ca or location=shanghai,cn will work

optional_parameters.name: u
optional_parameters.description: f for Fahrenheit or c for Celsius, default is f

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: xml or json, default is json

api_list.name: Search by woeid
api_list.description: To find your woeid, browse or search for your city from Yahoo Weather page. The woeid is in the URL for the forecast page for that city. For example, if you "Change location" for Sunnyvale, the forecast page for that city is https://www.yahoo.com/news/weather/united-states/sunnyvale/sunnyvale-**2502265**. The woeid is 2502265

optional_parameters.name: u
optional_parameters.description: f for Fahrenheit or c for Celsius, default is f

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: xml or json, default is json

api_list.name: Search by geolocation latitude & longitude
api_list.description: input location latitude & longitude number, Example: lat=37.372&lon=-122.038

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: xml or json, default is json

optional_parameters.name: u
optional_parameters.description: f for Fahrenheit or c for Celsius, default is f
